alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:21PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nye County through 445 PM PDT... At 421 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles southeast of Blue Eagle Ranch, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Nye County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
